06356         enum lexeme_t 
06357         { 
06358                 lex_none = 0, 
06359                 lex_equal, 
06360                 lex_not_equal, 
06361                 lex_less, 
06362                 lex_greater, 
06363                 lex_less_or_equal, 
06364                 lex_greater_or_equal, 
06365                 lex_plus, 
06366                 lex_minus, 
06367                 lex_multiply, 
06368                 lex_union, 
06369                 lex_var_ref, 
06370                 lex_open_brace, 
06371                 lex_close_brace,

06373                 lex_number,

06376                 lex_open_square_brace, 
06377                 lex_close_square_brace,

06381                 lex_dot, 
06382                 lex_double_dot, 
06383                 lex_double_colon, 
06384                 lex_eof

06388         {

06393                 {

06397                 { 
06398                         size_t length = static_cast<size_t>(end - begin); 
06399  
06400                         return strequalrange(other, begin, length); 
06401                 } 
06402         }; 
06403  
06404         class xpath_lexer 
06405         { 
06406                 const char_t* _cur; 
06407                 const char_t* _cur_lexeme_pos; 
06408                 xpath_lexer_string _cur_lexeme_contents; 
06409  
06410                 lexeme_t _cur_lexeme; 
06411  
06412         public: 
06413                 explicit xpath_lexer(const char_t* query): _cur(query) 
06414                 { 
06415                         next(); 
06416                 } 
06417                  
06418                 const char_t* state() const 
06419                 { 
06420                         return _cur; 
06421                 } 
06422                  
06423                 void next() 
06424                 { 
06425                         const char_t* cur = _cur; 
06426  
06427                         while (IS_CHARTYPE(*cur, ct_space)) ++cur; 
06428  
06429                         // save lexeme position for error reporting 
06430                         _cur_lexeme_pos = cur; 
06431  
06432                         switch (*cur) 
06433                         { 
06434                         case 0: 
06435                                 _cur_lexeme = lex_eof; 
06436                                 break; 
06437                          
06438                         case '>': 
06439                                 if (*(cur+1) == '=') 
06440                                 { 
06441                                         cur += 2; 
06442                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_greater_or_equal; 
06443                                 } 
06444                                 else 
06445                                 { 
06446                                         cur += 1; 
06447                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_greater; 
06448                                 } 
06449                                 break; 
06450  
06451                         case '<': 
06452                                 if (*(cur+1) == '=') 
06453                                 { 
06454                                         cur += 2; 
06455                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_less_or_equal; 
06456                                 } 
06457                                 else 
06458                                 { 
06459                                         cur += 1; 
06460                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_less; 
06461                                 } 
06462                                 break; 
06463  
06464                         case '!': 
06465                                 if (*(cur+1) == '=') 
06466                                 { 
06467                                         cur += 2; 
06468                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_not_equal; 
06469                                 } 
06470                                 else 
06471                                 { 
06472                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_none; 
06473                                 } 
06474                                 break; 
06475  
06476                         case '=': 
06477                                 cur += 1; 
06478                                 _cur_lexeme = lex_equal; 
06479  
06480                                 break; 
06481                          
06482                         case '+': 
06483                                 cur += 1; 
06484                                 _cur_lexeme = lex_plus; 
06485  
06486                                 break; 
06487  
06488                         case '-': 
06489                                 cur += 1; 
06490                                 _cur_lexeme = lex_minus; 
06491  
06492                                 break; 
06493  
06494                         case '*': 
06495                                 cur += 1; 
06496                                 _cur_lexeme = lex_multiply; 
06497  
06498                                 break; 
06499  
06500                         case '|': 
06501                                 cur += 1; 
06502                                 _cur_lexeme = lex_union; 
06503  
06504                                 break; 
06505                          
06506                         case '$': 
06507                                 cur += 1; 
06508  
06509                                 if (IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_start_symbol)) 
06510                                 { 
06511                                         _cur_lexeme_contents.begin = cur; 
06512  
06513                                         while (IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_symbol)) cur++; 
06514  
06515                                         if (cur[0] == ':' && IS_CHARTYPEX(cur[1], ctx_symbol)) // qname 
06516                                         { 
06517                                                 cur++; // : 
06518  
06519                                                 while (IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_symbol)) cur++; 
06520                                         } 
06521  
06522                                         _cur_lexeme_contents.end = cur; 
06523                                  
06524                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_var_ref; 
06525                                 } 
06526                                 else 
06527                                 { 
06528                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_none; 
06529                                 } 
06530  
06531                                 break; 
06532  
06533                         case '(': 
06534                                 cur += 1; 
06535                                 _cur_lexeme = lex_open_brace; 
06536  
06537                                 break; 
06538  
06539                         case ')': 
06540                                 cur += 1; 
06541                                 _cur_lexeme = lex_close_brace; 
06542  
06543                                 break; 
06544                          
06545                         case '[': 
06546                                 cur += 1; 
06547                                 _cur_lexeme = lex_open_square_brace; 
06548  
06549                                 break; 
06550  
06551                         case ']': 
06552                                 cur += 1; 
06553                                 _cur_lexeme = lex_close_square_brace; 
06554  
06555                                 break; 
06556  
06557                         case ',': 
06558                                 cur += 1; 
06559                                 _cur_lexeme = lex_comma; 
06560  
06561                                 break; 
06562  
06563                         case '/': 
06564                                 if (*(cur+1) == '/') 
06565                                 { 
06566                                         cur += 2; 
06567                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_double_slash; 
06568                                 } 
06569                                 else 
06570                                 { 
06571                                         cur += 1; 
06572                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_slash; 
06573                                 } 
06574                                 break; 
06575                  
06576                         case '.': 
06577                                 if (*(cur+1) == '.') 
06578                                 { 
06579                                         cur += 2; 
06580                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_double_dot; 
06581                                 } 
06582                                 else if (IS_CHARTYPEX(*(cur+1), ctx_digit)) 
06583                                 { 
06584                                         _cur_lexeme_contents.begin = cur; // . 
06585  
06586                                         ++cur; 
06587  
06588                                         while (IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_digit)) cur++; 
06589  
06590                                         _cur_lexeme_contents.end = cur; 
06591                                          
06592                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_number; 
06593                                 } 
06594                                 else 
06595                                 { 
06596                                         cur += 1; 
06597                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_dot; 
06598                                 } 
06599                                 break; 
06600  
06601                         case '@': 
06602                                 cur += 1; 
06603                                 _cur_lexeme = lex_axis_attribute; 
06604  
06605                                 break; 
06606  
06607                         case '"': 
06608                         case '\'': 
06609                         { 
06610                                 char_t terminator = *cur; 
06611  
06612                                 ++cur; 
06613  
06614                                 _cur_lexeme_contents.begin = cur; 
06615                                 while (*cur && *cur != terminator) cur++; 
06616                                 _cur_lexeme_contents.end = cur; 
06617                                  
06618                                 if (!*cur) 
06619                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_none; 
06620                                 else 
06621                                 { 
06622                                         cur += 1; 
06623                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_quoted_string; 
06624                                 } 
06625  
06626                                 break; 
06627                         } 
06628  
06629                         case ':': 
06630                                 if (*(cur+1) == ':') 
06631                                 { 
06632                                         cur += 2; 
06633                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_double_colon; 
06634                                 } 
06635                                 else 
06636                                 { 
06637                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_none; 
06638                                 } 
06639                                 break; 
06640  
06641                         default: 
06642                                 if (IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_digit)) 
06643                                 { 
06644                                         _cur_lexeme_contents.begin = cur; 
06645  
06646                                         while (IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_digit)) cur++; 
06647                                  
06648                                         if (*cur == '.') 
06649                                         { 
06650                                                 cur++; 
06651  
06652                                                 while (IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_digit)) cur++; 
06653                                         } 
06654  
06655                                         _cur_lexeme_contents.end = cur; 
06656  
06657                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_number; 
06658                                 } 
06659                                 else if (IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_start_symbol)) 
06660                                 { 
06661                                         _cur_lexeme_contents.begin = cur; 
06662  
06663                                         while (IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_symbol)) cur++; 
06664  
06665                                         if (cur[0] == ':') 
06666                                         { 
06667                                                 if (cur[1] == '*') // namespace test ncname:* 
06668                                                 { 
06669                                                         cur += 2; // :* 
06670                                                 } 
06671                                                 else if (IS_CHARTYPEX(cur[1], ctx_symbol)) // namespace test qname 
06672                                                 { 
06673                                                         cur++; // : 
06674  
06675                                                         while (IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_symbol)) cur++; 
06676                                                 } 
06677                                         } 
06678  
06679                                         _cur_lexeme_contents.end = cur; 
06680                                  
06681                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_string; 
06682                                 } 
06683                                 else 
06684                                 { 
06685                                         _cur_lexeme = lex_none; 
06686                                 } 
06687                         } 
06688  
06689                         _cur = cur; 
06690                 } 
06691  
06692                 lexeme_t current() const 
06693                 { 
06694                         return _cur_lexeme; 
06695                 } 
06696  
06697                 const char_t* current_pos() const 
06698                 { 
06699                         return _cur_lexeme_pos; 
06700                 } 
06701  
06702                 const xpath_lexer_string& contents() const 
06703                 { 
06704                         assert(_cur_lexeme == lex_var_ref || _cur_lexeme == lex_number || _cur_lexeme == lex_string || _cur_lexeme == lex_quoted_string); 
06705  
06706                         return _cur_lexeme_contents; 
06707                 } 
06708         }; 
06709  
06710         enum ast_type_t 
06711         { 
06712                 ast_op_or,                                              // left or right 
06713                 ast_op_and,                                             // left and right 
06714                 ast_op_equal,                                   // left = right 
06715                 ast_op_not_equal,                               // left != right 
06716                 ast_op_less,                                    // left < right 
06717                 ast_op_greater,                                 // left > right 
06718                 ast_op_less_or_equal,                   // left <= right 
06719                 ast_op_greater_or_equal,                // left >= right 
06720                 ast_op_add,                                             // left + right 
06721                 ast_op_subtract,                                // left - right 
06722                 ast_op_multiply,                                // left * right 
06723                 ast_op_divide,                                  // left / right 
06724                 ast_op_mod,                                             // left % right 
06725                 ast_op_negate,                                  // left - right 
06726                 ast_op_union,                                   // left | right 
06727                 ast_predicate,                                  // apply predicate to set; next points to next predicate 
06728                 ast_filter,                                             // select * from left where right 
06729                 ast_filter_posinv,                              // select * from left where right; proximity position invariant 
06730                 ast_string_constant,                    // string constant 
06731                 ast_number_constant,                    // number constant 
06732                 ast_variable,                                   // variable 
06733                 ast_func_last,                                  // last() 
06734                 ast_func_position,                              // position() 
06735                 ast_func_count,                                 // count(left) 
06736                 ast_func_id,                                    // id(left) 
06737                 ast_func_local_name_0,                  // local-name() 
06738                 ast_func_local_name_1,                  // local-name(left) 
06739                 ast_func_namespace_uri_0,               // namespace-uri() 
06740                 ast_func_namespace_uri_1,               // namespace-uri(left) 
06741                 ast_func_name_0,                                // name() 
06742                 ast_func_name_1,                                // name(left) 
06743                 ast_func_string_0,                              // string() 
06744                 ast_func_string_1,                              // string(left) 
06745                 ast_func_concat,                                // concat(left, right, siblings) 
06746                 ast_func_starts_with,                   // starts_with(left, right) 
06747                 ast_func_contains,                              // contains(left, right) 
06748                 ast_func_substring_before,              // substring-before(left, right) 
06749                 ast_func_substring_after,               // substring-after(left, right) 
06750                 ast_func_substring_2,                   // substring(left, right) 
06751                 ast_func_substring_3,                   // substring(left, right, third) 
06752                 ast_func_string_length_0,               // string-length() 
06753                 ast_func_string_length_1,               // string-length(left) 
06754                 ast_func_normalize_space_0,             // normalize-space() 
06755                 ast_func_normalize_space_1,             // normalize-space(left) 
06756                 ast_func_translate,                             // translate(left, right, third) 
06757                 ast_func_boolean,                               // boolean(left) 
06758                 ast_func_not,                                   // not(left) 
06759                 ast_func_true,                                  // true() 
06760                 ast_func_false,                                 // false() 
06761                 ast_func_lang,                                  // lang(left) 
06762                 ast_func_number_0,                              // number() 
06763                 ast_func_number_1,                              // number(left) 
06764                 ast_func_sum,                                   // sum(left) 
06765                 ast_func_floor,                                 // floor(left) 
06766                 ast_func_ceiling,                               // ceiling(left) 
06767                 ast_func_round,                                 // round(left) 
06768                 ast_step,                                               // process set left with step 
06769                 ast_step_root                                   // select root node 
06770         };

06772         enum axis_t 
06773         { 
06774                 axis_ancestor, 
06775                 axis_ancestor_or_self, 
06776                 axis_attribute, 
06777                 axis_child, 
06778                 axis_descendant, 
06779                 axis_descendant_or_self, 
06780                 axis_following, 
06781                 axis_following_sibling, 
06782                 axis_namespace, 
06783                 axis_parent, 
06784                 axis_preceding, 
06785                 axis_preceding_sibling, 
06786                 axis_self 
06787         };

06789         enum nodetest_t 
06790         { 
06791                 nodetest_none, 
06792                 nodetest_name, 
06793                 nodetest_type_node, 
06794                 nodetest_type_comment, 
06795                 nodetest_type_pi, 
06796                 nodetest_type_text, 
06797                 nodetest_pi, 
06798                 nodetest_all, 
06799                 nodetest_all_in_namespace

06802         template <axis_t N> struct axis_to_type 
06803         { 
06804                 static const axis_t axis; 
06805         }; 
06806  
06807         template <axis_t N> const axis_t axis_to_type<N>::axis = N; 
06808                  
06809         class xpath_ast_node 
06810         { 
06811         private: 
06812                 // node type 
06813                 char _type; 
06814                 char _rettype; 
06815  
06816                 // for ast_step / ast_predicate 
06817                 char _axis; 
06818                 char _test; 
06819  
06820                 // tree node structure 
06821                 xpath_ast_node* _left; 
06822                 xpath_ast_node* _right; 
06823                 xpath_ast_node* _next; 
06824  
06825                 union 
06826                 { 
06827                         // value for ast_string_constant 
06828                         const char_t* string; 
06829                         // value for ast_number_constant 
06830                         double number; 
06831                         // variable for ast_variable 
06832                         xpath_variable* variable; 
06833                         // node test for ast_step (node name/namespace/node type/pi target) 
06834                         const char_t* nodetest; 
06835                 } _data; 
06836  
06837                 xpath_ast_node(const xpath_ast_node&); 
06838                 xpath_ast_node& operator=(const xpath_ast_node&); 
06839  
06840                 template <class Comp> static bool compare_eq(xpath_ast_node* lhs, xpath_ast_node* rhs, const xpath_context& c, const xpath_stack& stack, const Comp& comp) 
06841                 { 
06842                         xpath_value_type lt = lhs->rettype(), rt = rhs->rettype(); 
06843  
06844                         if (lt != xpath_type_node_set && rt != xpath_type_node_set) 
06845                         { 
06846                                 if (lt == xpath_type_boolean || rt == xpath_type_boolean) 
06847                                         return comp(lhs->eval_boolean(c, stack), rhs->eval_boolean(c, stack)); 
06848                                 else if (lt == xpath_type_number || rt == xpath_type_number) 
06849                                         return comp(lhs->eval_number(c, stack), rhs->eval_number(c, stack)); 
06850                                 else if (lt == xpath_type_string || rt == xpath_type_string) 
06851                                 { 
06852                                         xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
06853  
06854                                         xpath_string ls = lhs->eval_string(c, stack); 
06855                                         xpath_string rs = rhs->eval_string(c, stack); 
06856  
06857                                         return comp(ls, rs); 
06858                                 } 
06859                         } 
06860                         else if (lt == xpath_type_node_set && rt == xpath_type_node_set) 
06861                         { 
06862                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
06863  
06864                                 xpath_node_set_raw ls = lhs->eval_node_set(c, stack); 
06865                                 xpath_node_set_raw rs = rhs->eval_node_set(c, stack); 
06866  
06867                                 for (const xpath_node* li = ls.begin(); li != ls.end(); ++li) 
06868                                         for (const xpath_node* ri = rs.begin(); ri != rs.end(); ++ri) 
06869                                         { 
06870                                                 xpath_allocator_capture cri(stack.result); 
06871  
06872                                                 if (comp(string_value(*li, stack.result), string_value(*ri, stack.result))) 
06873                                                         return true; 
06874                                         } 
06875  
06876                                 return false; 
06877                         } 
06878                         else 
06879                         { 
06880                                 if (lt == xpath_type_node_set) 
06881                                 { 
06882                                         swap(lhs, rhs); 
06883                                         swap(lt, rt); 
06884                                 } 
06885  
06886                                 if (lt == xpath_type_boolean) 
06887                                         return comp(lhs->eval_boolean(c, stack), rhs->eval_boolean(c, stack)); 
06888                                 else if (lt == xpath_type_number) 
06889                                 { 
06890                                         xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
06891  
06892                                         double l = lhs->eval_number(c, stack); 
06893                                         xpath_node_set_raw rs = rhs->eval_node_set(c, stack); 
06894  
06895                                         for (const xpath_node* ri = rs.begin(); ri != rs.end(); ++ri) 
06896                                         { 
06897                                                 xpath_allocator_capture cri(stack.result); 
06898  
06899                                                 if (comp(l, convert_string_to_number(string_value(*ri, stack.result).c_str()))) 
06900                                                         return true; 
06901                                         } 
06902  
06903                                         return false; 
06904                                 } 
06905                                 else if (lt == xpath_type_string) 
06906                                 { 
06907                                         xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
06908  
06909                                         xpath_string l = lhs->eval_string(c, stack); 
06910                                         xpath_node_set_raw rs = rhs->eval_node_set(c, stack); 
06911  
06912                                         for (const xpath_node* ri = rs.begin(); ri != rs.end(); ++ri) 
06913                                         { 
06914                                                 xpath_allocator_capture cri(stack.result); 
06915  
06916                                                 if (comp(l, string_value(*ri, stack.result))) 
06917                                                         return true; 
06918                                         } 
06919  
06920                                         return false; 
06921                                 } 
06922                         } 
06923  
06924                         assert(!"Wrong types"); 
06925                         return false; 
06926                 } 
06927  
06928                 template <class Comp> static bool compare_rel(xpath_ast_node* lhs, xpath_ast_node* rhs, const xpath_context& c, const xpath_stack& stack, const Comp& comp) 
06929                 { 
06930                         xpath_value_type lt = lhs->rettype(), rt = rhs->rettype(); 
06931  
06932                         if (lt != xpath_type_node_set && rt != xpath_type_node_set) 
06933                                 return comp(lhs->eval_number(c, stack), rhs->eval_number(c, stack)); 
06934                         else if (lt == xpath_type_node_set && rt == xpath_type_node_set) 
06935                         { 
06936                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
06937  
06938                                 xpath_node_set_raw ls = lhs->eval_node_set(c, stack); 
06939                                 xpath_node_set_raw rs = rhs->eval_node_set(c, stack); 
06940  
06941                                 for (const xpath_node* li = ls.begin(); li != ls.end(); ++li) 
06942                                 { 
06943                                         xpath_allocator_capture cri(stack.result); 
06944  
06945                                         double l = convert_string_to_number(string_value(*li, stack.result).c_str()); 
06946  
06947                                         for (const xpath_node* ri = rs.begin(); ri != rs.end(); ++ri) 
06948                                         { 
06949                                                 xpath_allocator_capture crii(stack.result); 
06950  
06951                                                 if (comp(l, convert_string_to_number(string_value(*ri, stack.result).c_str()))) 
06952                                                         return true; 
06953                                         } 
06954                                 } 
06955  
06956                                 return false; 
06957                         } 
06958                         else if (lt != xpath_type_node_set && rt == xpath_type_node_set) 
06959                         { 
06960                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
06961  
06962                                 double l = lhs->eval_number(c, stack); 
06963                                 xpath_node_set_raw rs = rhs->eval_node_set(c, stack); 
06964  
06965                                 for (const xpath_node* ri = rs.begin(); ri != rs.end(); ++ri) 
06966                                 { 
06967                                         xpath_allocator_capture cri(stack.result); 
06968  
06969                                         if (comp(l, convert_string_to_number(string_value(*ri, stack.result).c_str()))) 
06970                                                 return true; 
06971                                 } 
06972  
06973                                 return false; 
06974                         } 
06975                         else if (lt == xpath_type_node_set && rt != xpath_type_node_set) 
06976                         { 
06977                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
06978  
06979                                 xpath_node_set_raw ls = lhs->eval_node_set(c, stack); 
06980                                 double r = rhs->eval_number(c, stack); 
06981  
06982                                 for (const xpath_node* li = ls.begin(); li != ls.end(); ++li) 
06983                                 { 
06984                                         xpath_allocator_capture cri(stack.result); 
06985  
06986                                         if (comp(convert_string_to_number(string_value(*li, stack.result).c_str()), r)) 
06987                                                 return true; 
06988                                 } 
06989  
06990                                 return false; 
06991                         } 
06992                         else 
06993                         { 
06994                                 assert(!"Wrong types"); 
06995                                 return false; 
06996                         } 
06997                 } 
06998  
06999                 void apply_predicate(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, size_t first, xpath_ast_node* expr, const xpath_stack& stack) 
07000                 { 
07001                         assert(ns.size() >= first); 
07002  
07003                         size_t i = 1; 
07004                         size_t size = ns.size() - first; 
07005                                  
07006                         xpath_node* last = ns.begin() + first; 
07007                                  
07008                         // remove_if... or well, sort of 
07009                         for (xpath_node* it = last; it != ns.end(); ++it, ++i) 
07010                         { 
07011                                 xpath_context c(*it, i, size); 
07012                          
07013                                 if (expr->rettype() == xpath_type_number) 
07014                                 { 
07015                                         if (expr->eval_number(c, stack) == i) 
07016                                                 *last++ = *it; 
07017                                 } 
07018                                 else if (expr->eval_boolean(c, stack)) 
07019                                         *last++ = *it; 
07020                         } 
07021                          
07022                         ns.truncate(last); 
07023                 } 
07024  
07025                 void apply_predicates(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, size_t first, const xpath_stack& stack) 
07026                 { 
07027                         if (ns.size() == first) return; 
07028                          
07029                         for (xpath_ast_node* pred = _right; pred; pred = pred->_next) 
07030                         { 
07031                                 apply_predicate(ns, first, pred->_left, stack); 
07032                         } 
07033                 } 
07034  
07035                 void step_push(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, const Attribute& a, const Node& parent, xpath_allocator* alloc) 
07036                 { 
07037                         if (!a) return; 
07038  
07039                         const char_t* name = a.name(); 
07040  
07041                         // There are no attribute nodes corresponding to attributes that declare namespaces 
07042                         // That is, "xmlns:..." or "xmlns" 
07043                         if (starts_with(name, XML_TEXT("xmlns")) && (name[5] == 0 || name[5] == ':')) return; 
07044                          
07045                         switch (_test) 
07046                         { 
07047                         case nodetest_name: 
07048                                 if (strequal(name, _data.nodetest)) ns.push_back(xpath_node(a, parent), alloc); 
07049                                 break; 
07050                                  
07051                         case nodetest_type_node: 
07052                         case nodetest_all: 
07053                                 ns.push_back(xpath_node(a, parent), alloc); 
07054                                 break; 
07055                                  
07056                         case nodetest_all_in_namespace: 
07057                                 if (starts_with(name, _data.nodetest)) 
07058                                         ns.push_back(xpath_node(a, parent), alloc); 
07059                                 break; 
07060                          
07061                         default: 
07062                                 ; 
07063                         } 
07064                 } 
07065                  
07066                 void step_push(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, const Node& n, xpath_allocator* alloc) 
07067                 { 
07068                         if (!n) return; 
07069  
07070                         switch (_test) 
07071                         { 
07072                         case nodetest_name: 
07073                                 if (n.type() == node_element && strequal(n.name(), _data.nodetest)) ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07074                                 break; 
07075                                  
07076                         case nodetest_type_node: 
07077                                 ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07078                                 break; 
07079                                  
07080                         case nodetest_type_comment: 
07081                                 if (n.type() == node_comment) 
07082                                         ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07083                                 break; 
07084                                  
07085                         case nodetest_type_text: 
07086                                 if (n.type() == node_pcdata || n.type() == node_cdata) 
07087                                         ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07088                                 break; 
07089                                  
07090                         case nodetest_type_pi: 
07091                                 if (n.type() == node_pi) 
07092                                         ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07093                                 break; 
07094                                                                          
07095                         case nodetest_pi: 
07096                                 if (n.type() == node_pi && strequal(n.name(), _data.nodetest)) 
07097                                         ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07098                                 break; 
07099                                  
07100                         case nodetest_all: 
07101                                 if (n.type() == node_element) 
07102                                         ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07103                                 break; 
07104                                  
07105                         case nodetest_all_in_namespace: 
07106                                 if (n.type() == node_element && starts_with(n.name(), _data.nodetest)) 
07107                                         ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07108                                 break; 
07109  
07110                         default: 
07111                                 assert(!"Unknown axis"); 
07112                         }  
07113                 } 
07114  
07115                 template <class T> void step_fill(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, const Node& n, xpath_allocator* alloc, T) 
07116                 { 
07117                         const axis_t axis = T::axis; 
07118  
07119                         switch (axis) 
07120                         { 
07121                         case axis_attribute: 
07122                         { 
07123                                 for (Attribute a = n.first_attribute(); a; a = a.next_attribute()) 
07124                                         step_push(ns, a, n, alloc); 
07125                                  
07126                                 break; 
07127                         } 
07128                          
07129                         case axis_child: 
07130                         { 
07131                                 for (Node c = n.first_child(); c; c = c.next_sibling()) 
07132                                         step_push(ns, c, alloc); 
07133                                          
07134                                 break; 
07135                         } 
07136                          
07137                         case axis_descendant: 
07138                         case axis_descendant_or_self: 
07139                         { 
07140                                 if (axis == axis_descendant_or_self) 
07141                                         step_push(ns, n, alloc); 
07142                                          
07143                                 Node cur = n.first_child(); 
07144                                  
07145                                 while (cur && cur != n) 
07146                                 { 
07147                                         step_push(ns, cur, alloc); 
07148                                          
07149                                         if (cur.first_child()) 
07150                                                 cur = cur.first_child(); 
07151                                         else if (cur.next_sibling()) 
07152                                                 cur = cur.next_sibling(); 
07153                                         else 
07154                                         { 
07155                                                 while (!cur.next_sibling() && cur != n) 
07156                                                         cur = cur.parent(); 
07157                                          
07158                                                 if (cur != n) cur = cur.next_sibling(); 
07159                                         } 
07160                                 } 
07161                                  
07162                                 break; 
07163                         } 
07164                          
07165                         case axis_following_sibling: 
07166                         { 
07167                                 for (Node c = n.next_sibling(); c; c = c.next_sibling()) 
07168                                         step_push(ns, c, alloc); 
07169                                  
07170                                 break; 
07171                         } 
07172                          
07173                         case axis_preceding_sibling: 
07174                         { 
07175                                 for (Node c = n.previous_sibling(); c; c = c.previous_sibling()) 
07176                                         step_push(ns, c, alloc); 
07177                                  
07178                                 break; 
07179                         } 
07180                          
07181                         case axis_following: 
07182                         { 
07183                                 Node cur = n; 
07184  
07185                                 // exit from this node so that we don't include descendants 
07186                                 while (cur && !cur.next_sibling()) cur = cur.parent(); 
07187                                 cur = cur.next_sibling(); 
07188  
07189                                 for (;;) 
07190                                 { 
07191                                         step_push(ns, cur, alloc); 
07192  
07193                                         if (cur.first_child()) 
07194                                                 cur = cur.first_child(); 
07195                                         else if (cur.next_sibling()) 
07196                                                 cur = cur.next_sibling(); 
07197                                         else 
07198                                         { 
07199                                                 while (cur && !cur.next_sibling()) cur = cur.parent(); 
07200                                                 cur = cur.next_sibling(); 
07201  
07202                                                 if (!cur) break; 
07203                                         } 
07204                                 } 
07205  
07206                                 break; 
07207                         } 
07208  
07209                         case axis_preceding: 
07210                         { 
07211                                 Node cur = n; 
07212  
07213                                 while (cur && !cur.previous_sibling()) cur = cur.parent(); 
07214                                 cur = cur.previous_sibling(); 
07215  
07216                                 for (;;) 
07217                                 { 
07218                                         if (cur.last_child()) 
07219                                                 cur = cur.last_child(); 
07220                                         else 
07221                                         { 
07222                                                 // leaf node, can't be ancestor 
07223                                                 step_push(ns, cur, alloc); 
07224  
07225                                                 if (cur.previous_sibling()) 
07226                                                         cur = cur.previous_sibling(); 
07227                                                 else 
07228                                                 { 
07229                                                         do  
07230                                                         { 
07231                                                                 cur = cur.parent(); 
07232                                                                 if (!cur) break; 
07233  
07234                                                                 if (!node_is_ancestor(cur, n)) step_push(ns, cur, alloc); 
07235                                                         } 
07236                                                         while (!cur.previous_sibling()); 
07237  
07238                                                         cur = cur.previous_sibling(); 
07239  
07240                                                         if (!cur) break; 
07241                                                 } 
07242                                         } 
07243                                 } 
07244  
07245                                 break; 
07246                         } 
07247                          
07248                         case axis_ancestor: 
07249                         case axis_ancestor_or_self: 
07250                         { 
07251                                 if (axis == axis_ancestor_or_self) 
07252                                         step_push(ns, n, alloc); 
07253  
07254                                 Node cur = n.parent(); 
07255                                  
07256                                 while (cur) 
07257                                 { 
07258                                         step_push(ns, cur, alloc); 
07259                                          
07260                                         cur = cur.parent(); 
07261                                 } 
07262                                  
07263                                 break; 
07264                         } 
07265  
07266                         case axis_self: 
07267                         { 
07268                                 step_push(ns, n, alloc); 
07269  
07270                                 break; 
07271                         } 
07272  
07273                         case axis_parent: 
07274                         { 
07275                                 if (n.parent()) step_push(ns, n.parent(), alloc); 
07276  
07277                                 break; 
07278                         } 
07279                                  
07280                         default: 
07281                                 assert(!"Unimplemented axis"); 
07282                         } 
07283                 } 
07284                  
07285                 template <class T> void step_fill(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, const Attribute& a, const Node& p, xpath_allocator* alloc, T v) 
07286                 { 
07287                         const axis_t axis = T::axis; 
07288  
07289                         switch (axis) 
07290                         { 
07291                         case axis_ancestor: 
07292                         case axis_ancestor_or_self: 
07293                         { 
07294                                 if (axis == axis_ancestor_or_self && _test == nodetest_type_node) // reject attributes based on principal node type test 
07295                                         step_push(ns, a, p, alloc); 
07296  
07297                                 Node cur = p; 
07298                                  
07299                                 while (cur) 
07300                                 { 
07301                                         step_push(ns, cur, alloc); 
07302                                          
07303                                         cur = cur.parent(); 
07304                                 } 
07305                                  
07306                                 break; 
07307                         } 
07308  
07309                         case axis_descendant_or_self: 
07310                         case axis_self: 
07311                         { 
07312                                 if (_test == nodetest_type_node) // reject attributes based on principal node type test 
07313                                         step_push(ns, a, p, alloc); 
07314  
07315                                 break; 
07316                         } 
07317  
07318                         case axis_following: 
07319                         { 
07320                                 Node cur = p; 
07321                                  
07322                                 for (;;) 
07323                                 { 
07324                                         if (cur.first_child()) 
07325                                                 cur = cur.first_child(); 
07326                                         else if (cur.next_sibling()) 
07327                                                 cur = cur.next_sibling(); 
07328                                         else 
07329                                         { 
07330                                                 while (cur && !cur.next_sibling()) cur = cur.parent(); 
07331                                                 cur = cur.next_sibling(); 
07332                                                  
07333                                                 if (!cur) break; 
07334                                         } 
07335  
07336                                         step_push(ns, cur, alloc); 
07337                                 } 
07338  
07339                                 break; 
07340                         } 
07341  
07342                         case axis_parent: 
07343                         { 
07344                                 step_push(ns, p, alloc); 
07345  
07346                                 break; 
07347                         } 
07348  
07349                         case axis_preceding: 
07350                         { 
07351                                 // preceding:: axis does not include attribute nodes and attribute ancestors (they are the same as parent's ancestors), so we can reuse node preceding 
07352                                 step_fill(ns, p, alloc, v); 
07353                                 break; 
07354                         } 
07355                          
07356                         default: 
07357                                 assert(!"Unimplemented axis"); 
07358                         } 
07359                 } 
07360                  
07361                 template <class T> xpath_node_set_raw step_do(const xpath_context& c, const xpath_stack& stack, T v) 
07362                 { 
07363                         const axis_t axis = T::axis; 
07364                         bool attributes = (axis == axis_ancestor || axis == axis_ancestor_or_self || axis == axis_descendant_or_self || axis == axis_following || axis == axis_parent || axis == axis_preceding || axis == axis_self); 
07365  
07366                         xpath_node_set_raw ns; 
07367                         ns.set_type((axis == axis_ancestor || axis == axis_ancestor_or_self || axis == axis_preceding || axis == axis_preceding_sibling) ? xpath_node_set::type_sorted_reverse : xpath_node_set::type_sorted); 
07368  
07369                         if (_left) 
07370                         { 
07371                                 xpath_node_set_raw s = _left->eval_node_set(c, stack); 
07372  
07373                                 // self axis preserves the original order 
07374                                 if (axis == axis_self) ns.set_type(s.type()); 
07375  
07376                                 for (const xpath_node* it = s.begin(); it != s.end(); ++it) 
07377                                 { 
07378                                         size_t size = ns.size(); 
07379  
07380                                         // in general, all axes generate elements in a particular order, but there is no order guarantee if axis is applied to two nodes 
07381                                         if (axis != axis_self && size != 0) ns.set_type(xpath_node_set::type_unsorted); 
07382                                          
07383                                         if (it->node()) 
07384                                                 step_fill(ns, it->node(), stack.result, v); 
07385                                         else if (attributes) 
07386                                                 step_fill(ns, it->attribute(), it->parent(), stack.result, v); 
07387                                                  
07388                                         apply_predicates(ns, size, stack); 
07389                                 } 
07390                         } 
07391                         else 
07392                         { 
07393                                 if (c.n.node()) 
07394                                         step_fill(ns, c.n.node(), stack.result, v); 
07395                                 else if (attributes) 
07396                                         step_fill(ns, c.n.attribute(), c.n.parent(), stack.result, v); 
07397                                  
07398                                 apply_predicates(ns, 0, stack); 
07399                         } 
07400  
07401                         // child, attribute and self axes always generate unique set of nodes 
07402                         // for other axis, if the set stayed sorted, it stayed unique because the traversal algorithms do not visit the same node twice 
07403                         if (axis != axis_child && axis != axis_attribute && axis != axis_self && ns.type() == xpath_node_set::type_unsorted) 
07404                                 ns.remove_duplicates(); 
07405  
07406                         return ns; 
07407                 }

07412                 { 
07413                         assert(type == ast_string_constant); 
07414                         _data.string = value; 
07415                 }

07421                         _data.number = value;

07451  
07452                 bool eval_boolean(const xpath_context& c, const xpath_stack& stack) 
07453                 { 
07454                         switch (_type) 
07455                         { 
07456                         case ast_op_or: 
07457                                 return _left->eval_boolean(c, stack) || _right->eval_boolean(c, stack); 
07458                                  
07459                         case ast_op_and: 
07460                                 return _left->eval_boolean(c, stack) && _right->eval_boolean(c, stack); 
07461                                  
07462                         case ast_op_equal: 
07463                                 return compare_eq(_left, _right, c, stack, equal_to()); 
07464  
07465                         case ast_op_not_equal: 
07466                                 return compare_eq(_left, _right, c, stack, not_equal_to()); 
07467          
07468                         case ast_op_less: 
07469                                 return compare_rel(_left, _right, c, stack, less()); 
07470                          
07471                         case ast_op_greater: 
07472                                 return compare_rel(_right, _left, c, stack, less()); 
07473  
07474                         case ast_op_less_or_equal: 
07475                                 return compare_rel(_left, _right, c, stack, less_equal()); 
07476                          
07477                         case ast_op_greater_or_equal: 
07478                                 return compare_rel(_right, _left, c, stack, less_equal()); 
07479  
07480                         case ast_func_starts_with: 
07481                         { 
07482                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07483  
07484                                 xpath_string lr = _left->eval_string(c, stack); 
07485                                 xpath_string rr = _right->eval_string(c, stack); 
07486  
07487                                 return starts_with(lr.c_str(), rr.c_str()); 
07488                         } 
07489  
07490                         case ast_func_contains: 
07491                         { 
07492                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07493  
07494                                 xpath_string lr = _left->eval_string(c, stack); 
07495                                 xpath_string rr = _right->eval_string(c, stack); 
07496  
07497                                 return find_substring(lr.c_str(), rr.c_str()) != 0; 
07498                         } 
07499  
07500                         case ast_func_boolean: 
07501                                 return _left->eval_boolean(c, stack); 
07502                                  
07503                         case ast_func_not: 
07504                                 return !_left->eval_boolean(c, stack); 
07505                                  
07506                         case ast_func_true: 
07507                                 return true; 
07508                                  
07509                         case ast_func_false: 
07510                                 return false; 
07511  
07512                         case ast_func_lang: 
07513                         { 
07514                                 if (c.n.attribute()) return false; 
07515                                  
07516                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07517  
07518                                 xpath_string lang = _left->eval_string(c, stack); 
07519                                  
07520                                 for (Node n = c.n.node(); n; n = n.parent()) 
07521                                 { 
07522                                         Attribute a = n.attribute(XML_TEXT("xml:lang")); 
07523                                          
07524                                         if (a) 
07525                                         { 
07526                                                 const char_t* value = a.value(); 
07527                                                  
07528                                                 // strnicmp / strncasecmp is not portable 
07529                                                 for (const char_t* lit = lang.c_str(); *lit; ++lit) 
07530                                                 { 
07531                                                         if (tolower_ascii(*lit) != tolower_ascii(*value)) return false; 
07532                                                         ++value; 
07533                                                 } 
07534                                                  
07535                                                 return *value == 0 || *value == '-'; 
07536                                         } 
07537                                 } 
07538                                  
07539                                 return false; 
07540                         } 
07541  
07542                         case ast_variable: 
07543                         { 
07544                                 assert(_rettype == _data.variable->type()); 
07545  
07546                                 if (_rettype == xpath_type_boolean) 
07547                                         return _data.variable->get_boolean(); 
07548  
07549                                 // fallthrough to type conversion 
07550                         } 
07551  
07552                         default: 
07553                         { 
07554                                 switch (_rettype) 
07555                                 { 
07556                                 case xpath_type_number: 
07557                                         return convert_number_to_boolean(eval_number(c, stack)); 
07558                                          
07559                                 case xpath_type_string: 
07560                                 { 
07561                                         xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07562  
07563                                         return !eval_string(c, stack).empty(); 
07564                                 } 
07565                                          
07566                                 case xpath_type_node_set:                                
07567                                 { 
07568                                         xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07569  
07570                                         return !eval_node_set(c, stack).empty(); 
07571                                 } 
07572  
07573                                 default: 
07574                                         assert(!"Wrong expression for return type boolean"); 
07575                                         return false; 
07576                                 } 
07577                         } 
07578                         } 
07579                 } 
07580  
07581                 double eval_number(const xpath_context& c, const xpath_stack& stack) 
07582                 { 
07583                         switch (_type) 
07584                         { 
07585                         case ast_op_add: 
07586                                 return _left->eval_number(c, stack) + _right->eval_number(c, stack); 
07587                                  
07588                         case ast_op_subtract: 
07589                                 return _left->eval_number(c, stack) - _right->eval_number(c, stack); 
07590  
07591                         case ast_op_multiply: 
07592                                 return _left->eval_number(c, stack) * _right->eval_number(c, stack); 
07593  
07594                         case ast_op_divide: 
07595                                 return _left->eval_number(c, stack) / _right->eval_number(c, stack); 
07596  
07597                         case ast_op_mod: 
07598                                 return fmod(_left->eval_number(c, stack), _right->eval_number(c, stack)); 
07599  
07600                         case ast_op_negate: 
07601                                 return -_left->eval_number(c, stack); 
07602  
07603                         case ast_number_constant: 
07604                                 return _data.number; 
07605  
07606                         case ast_func_last: 
07607                                 return (double)c.size; 
07608                          
07609                         case ast_func_position: 
07610                                 return (double)c.position; 
07611  
07612                         case ast_func_count: 
07613                         { 
07614                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07615  
07616                                 return (double)_left->eval_node_set(c, stack).size(); 
07617                         } 
07618                          
07619                         case ast_func_string_length_0: 
07620                         { 
07621                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07622  
07623                                 return (double)string_value(c.n, stack.result).length(); 
07624                         } 
07625                          
07626                         case ast_func_string_length_1: 
07627                         { 
07628                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07629  
07630                                 return (double)_left->eval_string(c, stack).length(); 
07631                         } 
07632                          
07633                         case ast_func_number_0: 
07634                         { 
07635                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07636  
07637                                 return convert_string_to_number(string_value(c.n, stack.result).c_str()); 
07638                         } 
07639                          
07640                         case ast_func_number_1: 
07641                                 return _left->eval_number(c, stack); 
07642  
07643                         case ast_func_sum: 
07644                         { 
07645                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07646  
07647                                 double r = 0; 
07648                                  
07649                                 xpath_node_set_raw ns = _left->eval_node_set(c, stack); 
07650                                  
07651                                 for (const xpath_node* it = ns.begin(); it != ns.end(); ++it) 
07652                                 { 
07653                                         xpath_allocator_capture cri(stack.result); 
07654  
07655                                         r += convert_string_to_number(string_value(*it, stack.result).c_str()); 
07656                                 } 
07657                          
07658                                 return r; 
07659                         } 
07660  
07661                         case ast_func_floor: 
07662                         { 
07663                                 double r = _left->eval_number(c, stack); 
07664                                  
07665                                 return r == r ? floor(r) : r; 
07666                         } 
07667  
07668                         case ast_func_ceiling: 
07669                         { 
07670                                 double r = _left->eval_number(c, stack); 
07671                                  
07672                                 return r == r ? ceil(r) : r; 
07673                         } 
07674  
07675                         case ast_func_round: 
07676                                 return round_nearest_nzero(_left->eval_number(c, stack)); 
07677                          
07678                         case ast_variable: 
07679                         { 
07680                                 assert(_rettype == _data.variable->type()); 
07681  
07682                                 if (_rettype == xpath_type_number) 
07683                                         return _data.variable->get_number(); 
07684  
07685                                 // fallthrough to type conversion 
07686                         } 
07687  
07688                         default: 
07689                         { 
07690                                 switch (_rettype) 
07691                                 { 
07692                                 case xpath_type_boolean: 
07693                                         return eval_boolean(c, stack) ? 1 : 0; 
07694                                          
07695                                 case xpath_type_string: 
07696                                 { 
07697                                         xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07698  
07699                                         return convert_string_to_number(eval_string(c, stack).c_str()); 
07700                                 } 
07701                                          
07702                                 case xpath_type_node_set: 
07703                                 { 
07704                                         xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07705  
07706                                         return convert_string_to_number(eval_string(c, stack).c_str()); 
07707                                 } 
07708                                          
07709                                 default: 
07710                                         assert(!"Wrong expression for return type number"); 
07711                                         return 0; 
07712                                 } 
07713                                  
07714                         } 
07715                         } 
07716                 } 
07717                  
07718                 xpath_string eval_string_concat(const xpath_context& c, const xpath_stack& stack) 
07719                 { 
07720                         assert(_type == ast_func_concat); 
07721  
07722                         xpath_allocator_capture ct(stack.temp); 
07723  
07724                         // count the string number 
07725                         size_t count = 1; 
07726                         for (xpath_ast_node* nc = _right; nc; nc = nc->_next) count++; 
07727  
07728                         // gather all strings 
07729                         xpath_string static_buffer[4]; 
07730                         xpath_string* buffer = static_buffer; 
07731  
07732                         // allocate on-heap for large concats 
07733                         if (count > sizeof(static_buffer) / sizeof(static_buffer[0])) 
07734                         { 
07735                                 buffer = static_cast<xpath_string*>(stack.temp->allocate(count * sizeof(xpath_string))); 
07736                                 assert(buffer); 
07737                         } 
07738  
07739                         // evaluate all strings to temporary stack 
07740                         xpath_stack swapped_stack = {stack.temp, stack.result}; 
07741  
07742                         buffer[0] = _left->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07743  
07744                         size_t pos = 1; 
07745                         for (xpath_ast_node* n = _right; n; n = n->_next, ++pos) buffer[pos] = n->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07746                         assert(pos == count); 
07747  
07748                         // get total length 
07749                         size_t length = 0; 
07750                         for (size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i) length += buffer[i].length(); 
07751  
07752                         // create final string 
07753                         char_t* result = static_cast<char_t*>(stack.result->allocate((length + 1) * sizeof(char_t))); 
07754                         assert(result); 
07755  
07756                         char_t* ri = result; 
07757  
07758                         for (size_t j = 0; j < count; ++j) 
07759                                 for (const char_t* bi = buffer[j].c_str(); *bi; ++bi) 
07760                                         *ri++ = *bi; 
07761  
07762                         *ri = 0; 
07763  
07764                         return xpath_string(result, true); 
07765                 } 
07766  
07767                 xpath_string eval_string(const xpath_context& c, const xpath_stack& stack) 
07768                 { 
07769                         switch (_type) 
07770                         { 
07771                         case ast_string_constant: 
07772                                 return xpath_string_const(_data.string); 
07773                          
07774                         case ast_func_local_name_0: 
07775                         { 
07776                                 xpath_node na = c.n; 
07777                                  
07778                                 return xpath_string_const(local_name(na)); 
07779                         } 
07780  
07781                         case ast_func_local_name_1: 
07782                         { 
07783                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07784  
07785                                 xpath_node_set_raw ns = _left->eval_node_set(c, stack); 
07786                                 xpath_node na = ns.first(); 
07787                                  
07788                                 return xpath_string_const(local_name(na)); 
07789                         } 
07790  
07791                         case ast_func_name_0: 
07792                         { 
07793                                 xpath_node na = c.n; 
07794                                  
07795                                 return xpath_string_const(qualified_name(na)); 
07796                         } 
07797  
07798                         case ast_func_name_1: 
07799                         { 
07800                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07801  
07802                                 xpath_node_set_raw ns = _left->eval_node_set(c, stack); 
07803                                 xpath_node na = ns.first(); 
07804                                  
07805                                 return xpath_string_const(qualified_name(na)); 
07806                         } 
07807  
07808                         case ast_func_namespace_uri_0: 
07809                         { 
07810                                 xpath_node na = c.n; 
07811                                  
07812                                 return xpath_string_const(namespace_uri(na)); 
07813                         } 
07814  
07815                         case ast_func_namespace_uri_1: 
07816                         { 
07817                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result); 
07818  
07819                                 xpath_node_set_raw ns = _left->eval_node_set(c, stack); 
07820                                 xpath_node na = ns.first(); 
07821                                  
07822                                 return xpath_string_const(namespace_uri(na)); 
07823                         } 
07824  
07825                         case ast_func_string_0: 
07826                                 return string_value(c.n, stack.result); 
07827  
07828                         case ast_func_string_1: 
07829                                 return _left->eval_string(c, stack); 
07830  
07831                         case ast_func_concat: 
07832                                 return eval_string_concat(c, stack); 
07833  
07834                         case ast_func_substring_before: 
07835                         { 
07836                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.temp); 
07837  
07838                                 xpath_stack swapped_stack = {stack.temp, stack.result}; 
07839  
07840                                 xpath_string s = _left->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07841                                 xpath_string p = _right->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07842  
07843                                 const char_t* pos = find_substring(s.c_str(), p.c_str()); 
07844                                  
07845                                 return pos ? xpath_string(s.c_str(), pos, stack.result) : xpath_string(); 
07846                         } 
07847                          
07848                         case ast_func_substring_after: 
07849                         { 
07850                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.temp); 
07851  
07852                                 xpath_stack swapped_stack = {stack.temp, stack.result}; 
07853  
07854                                 xpath_string s = _left->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07855                                 xpath_string p = _right->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07856                                  
07857                                 const char_t* pos = find_substring(s.c_str(), p.c_str()); 
07858                                 if (!pos) return xpath_string(); 
07859  
07860                                 const char_t* result = pos + p.length(); 
07861  
07862                                 return s.uses_heap() ? xpath_string(result, stack.result) : xpath_string_const(result); 
07863                         } 
07864  
07865                         case ast_func_substring_2: 
07866                         { 
07867                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.temp); 
07868  
07869                                 xpath_stack swapped_stack = {stack.temp, stack.result}; 
07870  
07871                                 xpath_string s = _left->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07872                                 size_t s_length = s.length(); 
07873  
07874                                 double first = round_nearest(_right->eval_number(c, stack)); 
07875                                  
07876                                 if (is_nan(first)) return xpath_string(); // NaN 
07877                                 else if (first >= s_length + 1) return xpath_string(); 
07878                                  
07879                                 size_t pos = first < 1 ? 1 : (size_t)first; 
07880                                 assert(1 <= pos && pos <= s_length + 1); 
07881  
07882                                 const char_t* rbegin = s.c_str() + (pos - 1); 
07883                                  
07884                                 return s.uses_heap() ? xpath_string(rbegin, stack.result) : xpath_string_const(rbegin); 
07885                         } 
07886                          
07887                         case ast_func_substring_3: 
07888                         { 
07889                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.temp); 
07890  
07891                                 xpath_stack swapped_stack = {stack.temp, stack.result}; 
07892  
07893                                 xpath_string s = _left->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07894                                 size_t s_length = s.length(); 
07895  
07896                                 double first = round_nearest(_right->eval_number(c, stack)); 
07897                                 double last = first + round_nearest(_right->_next->eval_number(c, stack)); 
07898                                  
07899                                 if (is_nan(first) || is_nan(last)) return xpath_string(); 
07900                                 else if (first >= s_length + 1) return xpath_string(); 
07901                                 else if (first >= last) return xpath_string(); 
07902                                 else if (last < 1) return xpath_string(); 
07903                                  
07904                                 size_t pos = first < 1 ? 1 : (size_t)first; 
07905                                 size_t end = last >= s_length + 1 ? s_length + 1 : (size_t)last; 
07906  
07907                                 assert(1 <= pos && pos <= end && end <= s_length + 1); 
07908                                 const char_t* rbegin = s.c_str() + (pos - 1); 
07909                                 const char_t* rend = s.c_str() + (end - 1); 
07910  
07911                                 return (end == s_length + 1 && !s.uses_heap()) ? xpath_string_const(rbegin) : xpath_string(rbegin, rend, stack.result); 
07912                         } 
07913  
07914                         case ast_func_normalize_space_0: 
07915                         { 
07916                                 xpath_string s = string_value(c.n, stack.result); 
07917  
07918                                 normalize_space(s.data(stack.result)); 
07919  
07920                                 return s; 
07921                         } 
07922  
07923                         case ast_func_normalize_space_1: 
07924                         { 
07925                                 xpath_string s = _left->eval_string(c, stack); 
07926  
07927                                 normalize_space(s.data(stack.result)); 
07928                          
07929                                 return s; 
07930                         } 
07931  
07932                         case ast_func_translate: 
07933                         { 
07934                                 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.temp); 
07935  
07936                                 xpath_stack swapped_stack = {stack.temp, stack.result}; 
07937  
07938                                 xpath_string s = _left->eval_string(c, stack);
